医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现饮食中的反式痘痘酸可增强抗肿瘤免疫力影响抗肿瘤免疫力的膳食成分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-finds-diet-衍生-trans-vaccenic-acid-boosts-anti-tumor-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-finds-diet-衍生-trans-vaccenic-acid-boosts-anti-tumor-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f8b1a83-7aeb-43da-b15a-df2f6f7e0a83 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 05:09:00 -0500 Study finds diet-derived trans-vaccenic acid boosts anti-tumor immunity
研究证实通过坚持生活方式可以降低癌症风险研究人员研究了遵守世界癌症研究基金会 (WCRF)/美国癌症研究所 (AICR) 的癌症预防建议与癌症风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-validates-cancer-risk-reduction-through-lifestyle-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-validates-cancer-risk-reduction-through-lifestyle-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8063755a-1c11-4e26-8cfc-ff9fa8626d45 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 05:03:00 -0500 Study validates cancer risk reduction through lifestyle adherence
社会经济状况、临床变量和非 COVID-19 脓毒症风险之间的关联社会经济状况和临床变量对脓毒症发病率和死亡率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Associations- Between-socioeconomic-status-clinical-variables-and-non-COVID-19-sepsis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Associations- Between-socioeconomic-status-clinical-variables-and-non-COVID-19-sepsis-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc0a7db9-0f8c-4341-94d3-69117bced6b6 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 04:36:00 -0500 Associations between socioeconomic status, clinical variables, and non-COVID-19 sepsis risk
研究人员利用工程细菌开发出 1 美元的癌症治疗方法如果一美元的剂量就能治愈癌症怎么办？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Researchers-develop-241-cancer-treatment-using-engineered-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Researchers-develop-241-cancer-treatment-using-engineered-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83c7a402-93be-43d2-9a6c-7da605cc9b3d Mon, 27 Nov 2023 23:50:19 -0500 Researchers develop $1 cancer treatment using engineered bacteria
可生物降解贴片有望纠正婴儿先天性心脏病科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学校区的科学家利用实验室工程组织创造了一种全厚度、可生物降解的贴片，有望纠正婴儿先天性心脏缺陷，限制侵入性手术，并比现有贴片更耐用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Biodegradable-patch-holds-promise-of- Correcting-congenital-heart-defects-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Biodegradable-patch-holds-promise-of- Correcting-congenital-heart-defects-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efe516fb-73bf-4dad-b35e-482dc950b2b7 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 23:19:09 -0500 Biodegradable patch holds promise of correcting congenital heart defects in infants
新的计算模型以前所未有的精度模拟癌细胞运动杜克大学的生物医学工程师显着增强了计算模型的能力，该模型可以模拟单个癌细胞在整个人体内长距离的移动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-computational-model-simulates-cancer-cell-movement-with-unprecedented- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-computational-model-simulates-cancer-cell-movement-with-unprecedented- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e20150be-f62a-4aa9-9c00-494ab69d9c1a Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:56:10 -0500 New computational model simulates cancer cell movement with unprecedented precision
研究揭示烟草烟雾对母乳的惊人影响，增加有毒元素研究表明，怀孕或哺乳期间主动和被动接触烟草烟雾都会显着增加母乳中汞、镉、铅和砷等有毒微量元素的含量，对婴儿构成严重的健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-exposes-tobacco-smokes-alarming-impact-on-breast-milk-elevating-有毒-elements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-exposes-tobacco-smokes-alarming-impact-on-breast-milk-elevating-有毒-elements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7bb496e-30e5-44a5-b7df-56c449fbf960 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:49:00 -0500 Study exposes tobacco smoke's alarming impact on breast milk, elevating toxic elements
研究发现，与交通相关的空气污染会导致血压升高一个多世纪以来，美国城市一直被交通繁忙的道路分割开来。州际高速公路和宽阔的主干道现已成为大多数大都市区的一个显着特征，汽车源源不断地涌入，将污染排放到附近的社区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Traffic-lated-air-pollution-raises-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Traffic-lated-air-pollution-raises-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffe05b99-804d-4c1e-b400-95c41cde8732 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:29:10 -0500 Traffic-related air pollution raises blood pressure, study finds
新的人工智能工具可以彻底改变儿童哮喘监测患有哮喘的成人和年龄较大的儿童可以在家中对症状进行客观测量，例如呼气峰流量 (PEF)，即一次用力呼气时的气流量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-AI-tool-could-revolutionize-asthma-monitoring-for-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-AI-tool-could-revolutionize-asthma-monitoring-for-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=927142ef-13e4-49d9-86a8-b248819dbd49 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:20:16 -0500 New AI tool could revolutionize asthma monitoring for children
机器学习解开抗菌素耐药性的秘密，识别超过 900 个关键基因研究人员采用基因注释、泛基因组学和机器学习等先进技术，识别出 12 种细菌中 900 多个与抗菌素耐药性相关的基因，其性能优于传统识别方法。这一突破性方法为耐药性的遗传基础提供了新的见解，有可能指导更有效抗生素的开发https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Machine-learning-unlocks-secrets-of-antimicrobial-resistance-identifying-over-900-key-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Machine-learning-unlocks-secrets-of-antimicrobial-resistance-identifying-over-900-key-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bbe9fdb-66b7-4e1e-9c18-03a59d11c895 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 22:17:00 -0500 Machine learning unlocks secrets of antimicrobial resistance, identifying over 900 key genes
